processingShapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • processingShapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a shape using processing methods

    ksrinivas788

        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the shape
        y - The y coordinate of the shape
        strokeColor - The color of stroke drawing the shape
        fillColor - The color to fill the shape
        strokeWeight - The weight of the stroke
